short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Level up your Google Chrome experience with a smooth football cursor! Made by football fans, for football fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will change the default (and boring) Google Chrome cursor into an image of a football. In addition to the visual change, this extension also makes cursor movement smoother for you!
